verbs.description: at a [V: growing] [ARG1: minneapolis homeless camp] a glimmer of hope for struggling families instead of driving everyone off a coalition of agencies has flocked in to help reflecting the unusual approach city officials and american indian leaders are taking at the tent city near hiawatha and cedar myrna threelegs american indians national law center on homelessness deers jacob frey deer family natives against heroin minneapolis american indian center denise deer
